definition[0]: to walk in a quick determined way without looking at people because you are angry
example[0]: She flounced out of the room.
definition[1]: a wide band of cloth with folds, which is stitched onto the edge of a skirt, dress, shirt, or curtain as a decoration
example[1]: The dress had red satin flounces at the bottom.
definition[2]: a way of walking in a quick determined way without looking at people, because you are angry
example[2]: She walked off with a flounce.
